content.title: üì© Cubiko Update: Thank You! The Next Step: Survey Schedule, SEB Refund, Sample Arrived and FAQs
content.creator:
SainSmart Team
March 8, 2025
content.content:
Dear Genmitsu Cubiko backers,
Our Kickstarter campaign has officially come to an end with $1,245,221 funded and 3,222 backers. THANK YOU SO MUCH for your incredible support! Your belief in Cubiko has brought this project to life, and we couldn‚Äôt have done it without you.
What‚Äôs Next?
Now, we shift our focus to the next phase: final testing, manufacturing preparations, and compliance processes. Everything is on track, and we will be following our timeline to ensure smooth progress towards shipping.
1. Survey & VAT/Taxes
We will send out a survey via PledgeBox soon to collect your shipping address and VAT/Taxes. The survey is expected to be sent 14 days after the campaign ends, following Kickstarter's standard payment process. We will also post an update to remind everyone when it‚Äôs time to fill it out.
2. SEB Refund Process
For those who pre-ordered with a $1 deposit and hold a pre-order number between No.1-1000, if you did not get a Super Early Bird tier but instead backed the Early Bird tier, you can contact us hello@sainsmart.com for a $50 refund.
‚ö†Ô∏è Important Note: Please contact us as soon as possible. Refunds are scheduled to begin one week after the campaign ends.
üì© Email Format:
Subject: Cubiko Pre-order Refund Application | Pre-order No. xxx
To: hello@sainsmart.com
Include in your email:

1. Pre-order email address
2. Pre-order number (No.1-No.1000) (Check it here)
3. Pledge details: Backer number (# xxx) & Kickstarter order email address
3. See the Cubiko Prototype in Action at NHS 2025!
We know many of you are eager to see Cubiko in action, and we‚Äôre excited to invite you to the National Hardware Show 2025! Visit us at Booth #W4230 to witness Cubiko‚Äôs capabilities firsthand and share your thoughts with us.
Register: http://nvyt.es/6552c01d8716f1b18aad
Date: March 18-20, 2025
Location: Las Vegas Convention Center (West Hall)
We‚Äôd love to meet you there!
4. Samples Arrived!
Our new sample units have arrived and entered the rigorous testing phase! üîç We plan to expand evaluations by sending units to additional third-party reviewers. üåü
Stay tuned for comprehensive insights coming your way! üì¢
5. Kickstarter Q & A
A) When will my card be charged? What should I do, if my Payment fails?
Kickstarter will begin collecting pledges straight away. If there's a problem charging your card, you'll have 7 days from the end of the campaign to address the issue.
The following are several reasons that could have caused the payment to fail. Please refer to the below information as guidance to fix it:
1. Make sure that there are sufficient resources in your bank account, and that the payment does not exceed your online payment limits. Check it directly in your online banking or call your bank for help.
2. During the charging period, the bank or card issuer may call you to confirm the payment. Please make sure that your phone is on all the time.
3. If your credit card linked with the Kickstarter account expires or is not available anymore, you can change the PAYMENT method on KICKSTARTER.
Instructions:
This will be a matter of logging in to your Kickstarter account and clicking "Fix Payment" at the top of the page. Or click "Retry your payment" and click "Add a new card" on the page of the errored pledge, fill up the information of an available card and agreement, click "Fix payment"
4.  If the credit card is correct and valid but the payment still fails, you can follow the KS tutorial to communicate with the bank directly in order to solve this issue and prepare the necessary information. Kickstarter Support
5.  If all the above failed, you can always feel free to contact us at hello@sainsmart.com and we will help you through it.
B) When and how will my shipping address be collected?
We will send out a survey via PledgeBox soon to collect your address. The survey will normally be sent to your Kickstarter email address 14 days after the campaign ends according to Kickstarter's payment process routine. And don‚Äôt worry we will remind you by posting an update on Kickstarter.
C) When will the shipping begin?
We expect to complete production around May 2025 and will begin preparing for shipment afterward. We will keep you updated on the progress and notify you once shipping arrangements are finalized.
Due to the delays with international logistics, the arrival time may vary among different countries and the time needed to deliver the package to your place will be different. Please be patient. We ensure you that we will update the shipping progress once the shipping starts and the tracking number will be available in your survey later as well.
D) How else can I stay in the loop?
Definitely consider taking a look at our Facebook group!
We hope the above information will help you out. Please stay tuned for more updates! Thanks again for all your love and support.
Kind regards,
SainSmart Team

comments.text: Hi Sainsmart Well done on closing out the campaign with great success. I would like to make a few requests for consideration. 1. Could you use a metal body for the base and rear for better strength and build quality/feel. To my knowledge it's plastic which would come across very cheap and not as rigid. 2. Could you make the item come default with the 20k motor and dust shoe. This would be welcomed by all I'm sure. 3. Can the screen possibly have a usbc port to plug in a usb touchscreen? This would make navigating the menu a bit nicer. 3. Would u consider a small e stop on the front for emergency. 4. Will you fix the concerns that the reviewer had about the perspex cover. He needed to 3d print something to strengthen the top. Thanks Hope to see this item come to fruition. Tristan
Great ideas

content.title: üì© Cubiko Update: First Third-Party Review is Here! Thanks for Your Patience!
content.creator:
SainSmart Team
March 7, 2025
content.content:
Hi everyone, 
We know many of you have been eagerly waiting for third-party reviews‚Äîthank you for your patience! Over the past month, we‚Äôve been working closely with THE CLACK SHACK to ensure he had everything needed to test Cubiko and create a video. It took a bit longer than expected, but we made it just in time! 
Check out the first review from THE CLACK SHACK, where he shares his hands-on experience and honest feedback. 
Meanwhile, we‚Äôre expecting to receive the latest production sample from our factory very soon. Once we have it, we‚Äôll film an unboxing video, showcase the engraving process, and share it with you. Join our Facebook group and stay tuned! 
We truly appreciate your patience and support‚Äîwe‚Äôre committed to keeping you informed every step of the way! üöÄ
Best,
SainSmart Team

comments.text: Will you be offering the Polishing Module as a Kickstarter add-on, or will this need to be purchased outside of the campaign?
Sorry, the Polishing Module is still in development and won‚Äôt be available as a Kickstarter add-on. Please stay tuned for updates on our website in the future!

content.title: ‚ùóCubiko Important Update: Supported Countries & Shipping Clarification
content.creator:
SainSmart Team
February 25, 2025
content.content:
üìå Clarification on Shipping Availability
All countries/regions currently available for selection on Kickstarter can be shipped to. ‚ùóAs long as you have successfully pledged, we will be able to ship your order. We apologize for any confusion caused by our update.
To clarify, we will not be adding additional shipping options for non-EU or Middle Eastern countries on Kickstarter. However, all currently available shipping destinations remain unchanged.
‚úÖ Supported Shipping Countries:
EU countries, United Kingdom, Australia, United States, Canada, Japan, Malaysia, Vietnam, Switzerland
‚ùå No Further Additions on Kickstarter:
We will not be adding new shipping options for other non-EU or Middle Eastern countries. Below are the countries not included in our Kickstarter shipping list:
Non-EU Countries:
Norway, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Ukraine, Belarus, Russia, Serbia, Albania, North Macedonia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Montenegro, Moldova, Kosovo, Turkey
Middle Eastern Countries:
Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates (UAE), Qatar, Kuwait, Bahrain, Oman, Iraq, Iran, Jordan, Lebanon, Syria, Yemen, Israel, Palestine (Gaza Strip & West Bank), Egypt
üì¶ Alternative Purchase Options
If you're from a country not supported on Kickstarter, here are your options:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Post-Kickstarter Purchase: Once the campaign ends, you can reach out to us via the SainSmart website for more details. https://www.sainsmart.com

2Ô∏è‚É£ Immediate Purchase Inquiry: If you'd like to purchase now, please contact us hello@sainsmart.com to discuss shipping costs to your location.
‚ùóAs long as you have successfully pledged, we will be able to ship your order.
We truly appreciate your support and understanding. Thank you for being part of the Cubiko journey! 
Best Regards, 
SainSmart Team

comments.text: Hi, the shipping fee to USA is $20 and duties/taxes will be collected later via survey.
Haha, where‚Äôs the very vocal Rupert?! ü§£ü§£ü§£
probably looking for some other tiny detail to lie about instead of seeking clarification

We sincerely value this community‚Äôs passion. As newcomers to crowdfunding, we take full responsibility for ambiguities in our communication ‚Äî we understand the confusion caused and are prioritizing clarity. Your trust means everything to us. Thank you for continuing to choose Cubiko.

content.title: üì© Cubiko Update: Dust Shoe Installation Guide | Shipping Update
content.creator:
SainSmart Team
February 24, 2025
content.content:
Hi friends,
We wanted to share two important updates with you:
1. Dust Shoe Installation Guide 
We've noticed that many of you are curious about how to properly install and use the dust shoe. To help ensure you get the best experience with your Cubiko, we‚Äôve put together a step-by-step guide for installation.
Due to the height limitation, installing the dust shoe requires removing the enclosure cover. Here are the detailed steps for proper installation:
Step 1: Remove the Enclosure Cover
Take off the enclosure cover from Cubiko to prepare for the installation.
Step 2: Install the Top Cover
Install the Top Cover of the dust shoe on the spindle with 2 pieces of M4 x 8 screws.
Step 3: Install the Lower Chamber
Align the magnet at the top of the Lower Chamber with the magnet on the Top Cover. The Lower Chamber is then connected to the Top Cover of the dust shoe. 
Step 4: Install the Vacuum Cleaner Tube
Insert the Vacuum Cleaner Tube with 32mm outer diameter into the tube  connection of the dust shoe Top Cover. 
We hope this guide helps you set up your dust shoe smoothly!
2. Shipping Update 
We regret to inform you that, after extensive discussions with our internal logistics team, we found that shipping costs to non-EU European countries and Middle Eastern regions are quite high. As a result, we will not be offering shipping to these areas during the Kickstarter campaign.
However, if you are still interested in purchasing Cubiko after the campaign ends,  please visit our site https://www.sainsmart.com and reach out to us there for more details. 
If you wish to purchase Cubiko now and need to inquire about shipping costs to your country, please contact our customer support at hello@sainsmart.com.
We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding.
Thank you for your continued support!
Best regards,
SainSmart Team

content.title: üì© Cubiko Update: $1 Million Reached üöÄ ‚Äì Extra Gifts for Everyone!
content.creator:
SainSmart Team
February 17, 2025
content.content:
Hi friends,
Cubiko has officially surpassed $1 million in funding!
üéÅ All stretch goals are unlocked and every backer will now receive the extra gifts. We are beyond grateful for this incredible journey. 
Stay tuned for more updates, and thank you for trusting us. üôå
Best,
SainSmart Team

comments.text: I understand the the hobby nature of the machine but with a minimal machining depth and feed speed and maximum RPM would it be possible to machine some more advanced materials? Stainless steel for example A2 or D2 steel.
Sorry, but due to performance constraints, Cubiko cannot process stainless steel and other rugged materials.
Congrats. Will you all be introducing a 4th axis module for this CNC?
Thanks! We're still working on it. Stay tuned!
Are there plans for additional stretch goals?
Hi, we currently don‚Äôt have any additional stretch goals planned. If we add more in the future, we‚Äôll post an update and let everyone know.
What about additional goals?? A lot of time left!!! Also will there be info released about how to use and software etc?

Hi, we currently don‚Äôt have any additional stretch goals planned. If we add more in the future, we‚Äôll post an update and let everyone know. We will release a step-by-step user guide later. The software compatibility guide can serve as a reference for now. https://www.sainsmart.com/blogs/news/sainsmart-software-compatibility-guide
Great
Thanks for your support!ü•∞
Congrats on officially hitting 1,000,000 backers!

Thanks for your support!ü•∞

content.title: üì© Cubiko Update: New Add-on Release! | About Pledging The Early Bird Tier
content.creator:
SainSmart Team
February 8, 2025
content.content:
Hi friends,
We are back again with another update! Your feedback keeps inspiring us, and we‚Äôve got something special to share today.
1. Dust Shoe Is Available Now
We‚Äôve heard your requests! Many of you have asked for a dust shoe to make cleaning easier, and we heard you! The dust shoe add-on is now available. Pair it with your Cubiko for an even better experience.
2. About Pledging The Early Bird Tier
We‚Äôre truly grateful for your overwhelming support for Cubiko! Here‚Äôs a quick clarification for pledging the Early Bird Tier:
Q: I didn‚Äôt pre-order. Can I still purchase an Early Bird tier? 
While pre-ordering offered priority access to these tiers, it didn‚Äôt guarantee a specific tier due to the nature of the Kickstarter platform.
If you didn‚Äôt pre-order, you‚Äôre still welcome to check out the available tiers and secure your spot! However, you won't receive the pre-order gift: Chromatic Coating End Mills (3PCS).
Thank you for your amazing support, and we appreciate your patience as we work to bring Cubiko to life! üöÄ
Share Cubiko with your friends to earn 7% Cash Back!
Best Regards,
SainSmart Team

comments.text: Hi friends, here's the instruction to add the add-on to your pledge. A. On Desktop: 1. Click "Manage your pledge" on the Cubiko page 2. Click "Change your pledge" 4. Confirm the selected tier by clicking the "pledge XY$" button 5. Select addons 6. Confirm with "Continue to payment" B. On Your Phone (Kickstarter app): Android version 1.Tap the menu icon and select the Cubiko project 2.Tap the ‚ÄúManage‚Äù button and then tap the ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù in the top right corner. 3.If you wish to keep your current reward tier, tap ‚ÄúContinue‚Äù. 4.Add add-on on the page, then tap the‚ÄúContinue with X add-ons‚Äù button 5.Tap ‚ÄúConfirm‚Äù to finish. IOS version 1.Tap the profile icon in the bottom and select the Cubiko project 2.Tap the ‚ÄúManage‚Äù button and then tap the ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù in the top right corner. 3.If you wish to keep your current reward tier, tap ‚ÄúContinue‚Äù. 4.Add add-on on the page, then tap the‚ÄúContinue with X add-ons‚Äù button 5.Tap ‚ÄúConfirm‚Äù to finish. Click here to learn more https://help.kickstarter.com/hc/en-us/articles/360053930194-How-can-I-change-my-pledge-amount-or-reward-selection-through-the-app

On Your Phone (Kickstarter app): Android version 1.Tap the menu icon and select the Cubiko project 2.Tap the ‚ÄúManage‚Äù button and then tap the ‚Äú‚Ä¶‚Äù in the top right corner. 3.If you wish to keep your current reward tier, tap ‚ÄúContinue‚Äù. 4.Add add-on on the page, then tap the‚ÄúContinue with X add-ons‚Äù button 5.Tap ‚ÄúConfirm‚Äù to finish. Click here to learn more https://help.kickstarter.com/hc/en-us/articles/360053930194-How-can-I-change-my-pledge-amount-or-reward-selection-through-the-app
Yes it is, I would advise reading some of the comments on KS/FB you'll find this question is asked every 10 minutes and the answer is the same on all of them.

content.title: üì© Cubiko Update: Stretch Goals Unveiled | About Super Early Bird Reservation Issues | 7% Cash Back | Shipping Update
content.creator:
SainSmart Team
February 7, 2025
content.content:
Hi friends,
Thank you so much for your support! We've got some exciting news to share with you.
1. Stretch Goals Unveiled
We hit our funding goal in just 2 minutes, and we've now surpassed $600K! This incredible achievement is all thanks to your overwhelming support. We couldn‚Äôt have done it without you!

To show our appreciation, we‚Äôre unveiling Stretch Goals:
$600,000 ‚Äì 2 x Additional Aluminum Clamps ‚úÖ (Unlocked already!)
$1,000,000 ‚Äì 30 x 1/8" Shank PCB Drill Bits (Next goal!)
The Stretch Goal gifts will be unlocked for everyone, no matter which tier you backed. Let‚Äôs push for $1M together! üöÄ
2. About Super Early Bird (SEB) Reservation Issues
Our Super Early Bird tier has officially sold out! Thank you for your enthusiasm. 
During our pre-launch phase, if you were among the first 1,000 pre-order customers but didn‚Äôt get SEB. Don‚Äôt worry‚Äîfollow the steps below, you can still get the offer!
Step 1: Go ahead and back another available tier.
Step 2: Once the campaign ends, send us your pre-order email, pre-order number and pledge details to hello@sainsmart.com, and we will refund the price difference so you can still enjoy the SEB pricing you locked in!
To ensure a smooth process, please use the following format when sending your email:
Email Format:
Email Subject: Cubiko Pre-order Refund Application | Pre-order No. xxx
Send to: hello@sainsmart.com
Content:
Pre-order email
Pre-order number
Pledge details (including pledge number and Kickstarter order email‚Äîyou may provide a screenshot or text description)
3. Earn 7% Cash Back!
We‚Äôre excited to introduce our Kickbooster Referral Program! Share Cubiko with your friends, and for every successful pledge made through your unique link, you‚Äôll earn 7% cash back!
How does it work?
‚úÖ Click here & get started.
‚úÖ Sign up on Kickbooster for free (takes less than a minute).
‚úÖ Share your custom booster link via social media, email, website, blog, etc.
‚úÖ Sit back, relax, and enjoy the cash piling up for every successful pledge you bring in!
Join now and start earning while sharing an amazing product with your friends!
4. Shipping Update
We‚Äôve confirmed that we can ship to Singapore! 
For other countries and regions, we‚Äôre still working on confirmations‚Äîstay tuned for more updates! üöÄ
Thank you once again for your incredible support! We‚Äôre excited to bring Cubiko to life with you.
Best,
SainSmart Team
